title: Formula Force Racing
description:
Welcome to Formula Force Racing, the definitive futuristic racer from The Pixel Bullies.
Formula Force Racing can be best described as the stepping stone between Formula 1 and Wipeout.
12 unique race tracks situated over the world.
4 Championships.
4 vehicle classes - Super Mini, Muscle Car, Super Car and Formula Force class.
3 Game Modes - Championship, Single Player and Time Trial.
Its custom built race tracks allow the cars to travel at extremely high speeds.
Banked corners, and wall riding offers millions of overtaking opportunities.
Awarded 'Indie Game of the Month June' by Windows Phone Central
Reviewed at 79% by All About Windows Phone - "if you're after a 'fun' racer that doesn't cost the earth and looks a million dollars then Formula Force Racing is well worth a purchase"
